messages.subject: I'm new too
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/31/02 2:33:16 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/31/02 2:33:16 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< What is your typical day is like?
If you use any curriculum, what do you use?
Are there groups or co-ops in the Twin City area for unschoolers?
How do unschoolers score on the mandatory standardized tests? >>

Typical day? No such thing.

No curriculum....unless you count passion and interest as curriculum!! :)

Which state are you in? There is more than one Twin City area in the U.S. and
this is an international list.

And I have no idea how unschoolers would/could score on tests, since we don't
view them as mandatory and will never, ever test unless for some weird reason
my children requested it.

Ren
